legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

media.ext_alt_text: On September 23, 2022, State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi met with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken at the compound of the Permanent Mission of China to the United Nations.
On September 23, 2022, State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi met with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken at the compound of the Permanent Mission of China to the United Nations.

legacy.full_text: SC&FM Wang Yi talked with @SecBlinken today: The two teams have carried out a series of engagements in accordance with the common understandings of the two presidents, which are generally useful. And we should focus on translating their common understandings into practical... https://t.co/ZFS9cKf4Ks

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: An informative and guiding annual Central Economic Work Conference has decided China’s priorities for economic work in 2023: Ensuring economic stability & pursuing steady progress. Check more: https://t.co/13EYt77yZc https://t.co/TmLvKh8yLq

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: President Xi Jinping @ #COP15: A sound ecosystem is essential for the prosperity of civilization. We must work together to promote harmonious co-existence btw Man&Nature, build a community of all life on the Earth, create a clean&beautiful world for us all.https://t.co/w3meyu2KZh https://t.co/hI4yw6cCzz

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: I met with @SecYellen today. We had an in-depth exchanges on the implementation of the important common understandings our two presidents have reached in their Bali meeting as well as bilateral and multilateral economic and financial issues of common concern. https://t.co/XScBYOW0Oj

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: We also agreed to continue to maintain engagement, strengthen macroeconomic policy coordination and communication on bilateral economic and trade issues, work on joint response to global challenges, and promote the healthy and stable development of China-US relations.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: Talked with @SCClemons at the @semafor Africa Summit. China-Africa relations are the bedrock of China’s foreign policy. Africa should be a place for international cooperation, not for major-power competition for geopolitical gains. Transcript: https://t.co/QXqj0Dgx2O https://t.co/Sz7I8l894E

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: China initiated the Global Cooperation Partnership on Clean Energy. The first batch of projects will go to 19 African countries. China is helping African countries to develop clean energies. And we are building low-carbon demonstration zones in some African countries.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: There are lots of areas and projects that China and the United States can work on together in Africa. We need to broaden our vision and expand our cooperation in Africa. We can work with the United States on peace, security and prosperity in Africa.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: Speaking at the @USChinaBusiness Gala 2022. As the world’s top two economies, China and the US need & can cooperate in more & greater areas. None of us wants to see global warming, but all of us want to see a “warming” of China-US cooperation. Full speech: https://t.co/aIR7Ler0lf https://t.co/VMJdp17ctg

The USCBC will celebrate its 50th birthday next year. Confucius said, “At fifty, I know what were the biddings of Heaven”. I believe the USCBC knows where this relationship should go, and will continue to lead the US business community to another 50 years of win-win cooperation.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: Speaking at the @USChinaBusiness Gala 2022. As the world’s top two economies, China and the US need & can cooperate in more & greater areas. None of us wants to see global warming, but all of us want to see a “warming” of China-US cooperation. Full speech: https://t.co/aIR7Ler0lf https://t.co/VMJdp17ctg

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: On issues concerning the economy and trade, people need to face the reality that China and US are deeply integrated, people should take the interests and voice of the business community seriously, follow business rules, and conduct professional discussions.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: We hope that our leaders’ common understandings will be earnestly implemented, & our two countries can set the tone of interactions as dialogue & win-win cooperation, so as to take China-US relations back to the track of healthy & stable development.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: Speaking at the @USChinaBusiness Gala 2022. As the world’s top two economies, China and the US need & can cooperate in more & greater areas. None of us wants to see global warming, but all of us want to see a “warming” of China-US cooperation. Full speech: https://t.co/aIR7Ler0lf https://t.co/VMJdp17ctg

I’m honored to be awarded @USChinaBusiness Distinguished Honoree. This carries special weight as our bilateral relations are faced with many challenges. I share it with the US business community. Together, we could do more for better China-US business relations.
